title: Luther v Henry VIII bring religious change

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Compare and contrast the motives and actions of Martin Luther in the German states and King Henry VIII in England in bringing about religious change during the Reformation.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
